articles.description: Former heavyweight world champion Tyson Fury will face Arslanbek Makhmudov in the UK on 11 April as he ends his latest spell of retirement.
articles.title: Tyson Fury to face Arslanbek Makhmudov in UK on 11 April

articles.description: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?
articles.title: Champions League: Which clubs can make top eight and qualify for knockouts in league stage final round?

articles.description: Novak Djokovic has only played 11 sets on his way to the Australian Open semi-finals, largely thanks to some good fortune. Does that help or hinder him?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic unsure whether good fortune leaves him fresh or undercooked for Jannik Sinner semi-final

articles.description: Fulham agree a £27million deal with Manchester City to sign Oscar Bobb.
articles.title: Oscar Bobb transfer news: Fulham reach agreement for Manchester City winger

articles.description: West Ham agree a deal to sell Brazil forward Lucas Paqueta to Flamengo for more than 41m euros (£35.5m).
articles.title: West Ham agree £35.5m sale of Lucas Paqueta to Flamengo

articles.description: France prop Uini Atonio is forced to retire after he was admitted to an intensive care unit following a "cardiac event".
articles.title: Uini Atonio: France and La Rochelle prop retires after 'cardiac event'

articles.description: Raheem Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent after reaching an agreement on his departure.
articles.title: Raheem Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka is two wins away from continuing her reign of dominance with a third Australian Open title in four years. Will anyone stop her?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Will anyone deny Aryna Sabalenka a third title in Melbourne?

articles.description: Aston Villa midfielder Youri Tielemans is been ruled out for up to 10 weeks, Unai Emery has confirmed.
articles.title: Aston Villa's Youri Tielemans sidelined for 8-10 weeks

articles.description: Full-back Hugo Keenan has returned home from Ireland's Six Nations training camp in Portugal after sustaining a fractured thumb.
articles.title: Six Nations: Injured Hugo Keenan fractures thumb during Ireland training
